text: The Girl from Arles () is a 1908 French silent drama movie directed by Albert Capellani.Jennifer Wild. The Parisian Avant-Garde in the Age of Cinema, 1900-1923The Girl from Arles and stars Paul Capellani, Henri Desfontaines, and Henry Kraus. ==Actors== * Paul Capellani as Frédéric * Henri Desfontaines as Mitifio * Henry Kraus as Balthazar * Jeanne Grumbach as L'Arlésienne ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1908 movies Category:French silent movies Category:French drama movies Category:Arles
title: The Girl from Arles
